entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison where Harry's father was kept. It is mentioned that he lived out his life there and is buried beside the prison.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo is Harry's grandfather. His last heirloom, a ring, was lost by Azkaban.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is Voldemort's uncle. His wand was stolen by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Azkaban is where Marvolo's last heirloom, a ring, was lost.
Voldemort murdered the Muggle man who had abandoned his witch mother.
Voldemort also murdered Morfin's Muggle grandparents.
